title: Managed Singletons: get started quickly
text: [To get started, create a new script and import the 'DTT.Singletons' namespace. You can now create your first Singleton behaviour class. Add your Singleton script to a game object and drag it into the project to make it a prefab.][Open the Singleton profile using the 'DTT/SingletonCore/Profile' menu item to manage your new Singleton.][i][Want to dive deeper? Take a look at our documentation:][l]
